Name: Run Build Pew!

Run , Build your ship piece-by-piece and make it work with the parts you find, Destroy outposts and waves of fleets, and Pick your battles carefully to overcome your hunters in this Fast-Paced Top-Down Action Roguelite Shooter . Run from the hunters, hide and maneuver your way through the map and always make sure to pick the fights that you can win. Building is simple, your drones will collect scraps, and your ship Factory will create Random Parts, Pick one and add it to your ship. Lots & lots of pew pew! A large Arsenal of parts from weird weapons to crazy contraptions, and just adding the right part will tip the scale in your favor. Endless possibilities!
